summary: An FBI Threat Intake Examiner forwards information about a caller who reported receiving a voicemail from an unnamed FBI agent regarding a report she filed on Jeffrey Epstein. The caller was attempting to return the call but did not know which agent to contact.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The document references a report filed about Jeffrey Epstein, indicating he is the subject of the caller's information.

events.title: Caller contacts FBI NTOC about Epstein report
events.description: A caller contacted the FBI National Threat Operations Center to report she was returning a call from an unknown FBI agent regarding information she had reported on Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: On July 9, 2019, a caller contacted the FBI NTOC regarding a report she had filed about Jeffrey Epstein.
The caller stated she had received a voicemail from an unnamed FBI agent wanting to speak about her report.
The FBI Threat Intake Examiner forwarded this information for situational awareness and potential action by the NY Division.
The document indicates ongoing FBI interest or investigation into Jeffrey Epstein as of July 2019.
